messages.content: What are the sources of the codebase?
The codebase is built upon AnimateDiff-MotionDirector, AnimateDiff, Tune-a-Video, MotionDirector, Text-To-Video-Finetuning, lora, and ComfyUI.
What are the minimum requirements for ComfyUI-ADMotionDirector?
It is tested with pytorch 2.1.1 + cu121 and 2.2.0 + cu121; older versions may have issues.
What is the role of AnimateDiff-MotionDirector in this project?
AnimateDiff-MotionDirector is used for generating texts by doing in-depth customization of diffusion models.
The project disclaims responsibility for user-generated content and excludes the project's contributors from any legal accountability related to user behavior.
What is the main purpose of using ComfyUI?
ComfyUI is used to create a GUI that utilizes a stable diffusion model to generate images and videos.
What does the ADMotionDirector custom node in ComfyUI do?
ADMotionDirector custom node in ComfyUI operates as a motion director, customizing the text-to-image diffusion models without specific tuning.
Which applications is ComfyUI used for?
ComfyUI is used for both academic research and creative purposes.
